title: Self-Regulated Learning Competency Development Workshop for Adult Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related basic science knowledge and online learning tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to apply scientific approaches to solving workplace problems, emphasizing a socioconstructivist collaborative learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, self-monitoring, resource utilization) to solve workplace problems
Learners can establish self-regulated learning plans and provide execution feedback through collaboration with peers.
Learners systematically document the self-regulated learning process using a scientific approach in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
